original_text: therefore thus says the Lord God: Behold, I, even I, am against you. And I will execute judgments in your midst in the sight of the nations.
korean_text: 그러므로 나 주 여호와가 말하노라 나 곧 내가 너를 치며 이방인의 목전에서 너에게 벌을 내리되

sentences.original_text: therefore thus says the Lord God:
I, even I, am against you.
And I will execute judgments in your midst
in the sight of the nations.
